	Britney Spears has sold her
body:
Feb 10, 2026 12:29pm PT	
	

			


			
			
	

									Photo by Jason Merritt/Getty Images)
	

		
	
				
	Britney Spears has sold her song catalog and an unclear number of other rights to Primary Wave, two sources confirm to Variety. Reps for both Spears and Primary Wave declined Varietyâ€˜s requests for comment; the news was first reported by TMZ.

	Details were unclear â€”and likely under iron-clad non-disclosure agreements â€” but TMZ estimated the deal to be in the low nine figures.

	More to comeâ€¦

title: â€˜Kangaroo Kidsâ€™: Family Adventure Filmâ€™s North American Rights Acquired by Scatena & Rosner Films, Release Date Set (EXCLUSIVE)
description:
Family adventure film â€œKangaroo Kidsâ€ has a new home.

	Scatena & Rosner Films announced the acquisition of North American rights to â€œKangaroo Kids,
body:
Family adventure film â€œKangaroo Kidsâ€ has a new home.

	Scatena & Rosner Films announced the acquisition of North American rights to â€œKangaroo Kids,â€ which is now set for VOD and digital release on Feb. 17. Branscombe Richmond (â€œThe Wrecking Crewâ€) headlines the cast of the family-friendly action adventure film, along with co-stars Kathleen Kinmont (â€œHalloween 4â€) and Emily Ashby (â€œZombie Strainâ€).




	

					Emily Ashby, Kathleen Kinmont and Branscombe Richmond.
									Paul Smith/Marisa Leigh/John Rodart
	



	Richmondâ€™s son Fairai Richmond directed â€œKangaroo Kids,â€ which is his second feature film.
	

	Per the press release, â€œKangaroo Kidsâ€ is the story of â€œJohnny (Josefina Baeza), a young girl working at her motherâ€™s struggling zoo, who forms an immediate, headline-making bond with the famous kangaroo brought in to save it. The attention attracts con artist Jacob (Robbie Allen), who sends three clumsy thieves led by Kodiak (Richmond) to steal the kangaroo and appease the wealthy Kathryn (Kinmont) and her ailing son. As the thieves bumble through their attempts to capture it, Jacob has to call in his lethal weapon, Maria (Ashby), to get the job done while Johnny rallies her friends to save the kangaroo and the zoo while thwarting Jacobâ€™s plans.â€

	â€œâ€™Kangaroo Kidsâ€™ is a joyful adventure that captures the magic of friendship, courage and teamwork,â€ Gato Scatena, managing director at S&R Films, said in a statement. â€œWeâ€™re thrilled to bring this heartwarming story to families this February and share a film that will leave kids and adults smiling from start to finish.â€

	The film was originally set to be released in 2023 on the now-defunct Sunn Stream OTT platform. In addition to the North American rights, Scatena & Rosner Films helped to complete post-production and will also handle Latin American distribution, as well as international sales 
	

	â€œKangaroo Kidsâ€ is now available for pre-order via iTunes, Amazon and Google Play. Watch the trailer below.

schema.headline: â€˜Kangaroo Kidsâ€™: Family Adventure Filmâ€™s North American Rights Acquired by Scatena & Rosner Films, Release Date Set (EXCLUSIVE)

title: Sony Scraps Thai-Inspired Animated Movie After Two Years of Development: Director Says It Was â€˜Judged as Not Commercial Enough to Produceâ€™
description: Animator Matt Braly says that Sony Pictures Animation scrapped his Thai-inspired animated movie after two years of development because the studio de
body:
Animator Matt Braly says that Sony Pictures Animation scrapped his Thai-inspired animated movie after two years of development because the studio deemed it â€œnot commercial enough to produce.â€

	Braly, a writer on Cartoon Networkâ€™s â€œSteven Universeâ€ and storyboard artist on â€œThe Mitchells vs the Machines,â€ doesnâ€™t specify the studio in his lengthy Instagram post detailing the situation. However, Sony Pictures Animation announced in 2023 the development of a feature from Braly and writer Rebecca Sugar.
	

	â€œAt the very start of 2025 I received the unfortunate news that the movie I had been working on for 2+ years at a major animation studio would not be moving forward,â€ Braly wrote on Instagram. â€œIâ€™m super proud of the lovely script that Rebecca Sugar and I wrote together and am disappointed that you will all likely never get to see the film. I had a really supportive development team, but the film was ultimately judged as not commercial enough to produce. I understand these decisions are not made lightly and have nothing but respect for the studio, which continues to put out amazing films.â€



	Sony Pictures Animation didnâ€™t respond to Varietyâ€™s request for comment.

	Braly described the film as an adventure about a â€œa teen boy traveling to the world of Thai spirits in order to cure himself just before undergoing a very scary & life altering operation necessary to live.â€ He added that this was â€œnot a story about finding a cure so much as it was about learning to accept oneâ€™s unchangeable circumstances with grace, and realizing that a different life than expected can still be a wonderful one.â€
	

	â€œIt was a deeply personal story for me as I was diagnosed with an incurable chronic illness at a very young age that brought permanent changes to my lifestyle,â€ Braly continued. â€œNot only that but it would have been an honor to bring more Thai culture to the big screen, a torch I hope someone else picks up.

	Braly also shared some of the artwork that was created during the development process. â€œHopefully you can close your eyes and imagine how cool the film would have been if completed. I wonâ€™t lie â€“ this decision really knocked the wind out of me for a few months and I struggled to find enthusiasm to be creative again,â€ he concluded. â€œWith some space though I think the experience has strengthened my resolve about what Iâ€™d like to pursue next and how Iâ€™d like to go about doing it.â€

schema.headline: Sony Scraps Thai-Inspired Animated Movie After Two Years of Development: Director Says It Was â€˜Judged as Not Commercial Enough to Produceâ€™

title: â€˜The Lincoln Lawyerâ€™ Season 4 Debuts With 9 Million Views in Four Days
description:
Feb 10, 2026 12:00pm PT	
	

	
		â€˜The Lincoln Lawyerâ€™ Season 4 Debuts With 9 Million Views in Four Days
	
	
			


			
			
	

									C
body:
Feb 10, 2026 12:00pm PT	
	

	
		â€˜The Lincoln Lawyerâ€™ Season 4 Debuts With 9 Million Views in Four Days
	
	
			


			
			
	

									COURTESY OF NETFLIX
	

		
	
				
	â€œThe Lincoln Lawyerâ€ returned to Netflix with its fourth season last week, which debuted with 9 million views in four days.

	That earned the season the No. 2 spot on the streamerâ€™s list of its Top 10 English-language TV titles of the week of Feb. 2-8, outranked only by â€œBridgertonâ€ Season 4, which was No. 1 for the second week in a row. This time, the Regency-era drama achieved 23.4 million views, down from its 39.7 milllion-view debut. Fans also continued to watch previous seasons of â€œBridgertonâ€: Season 1 took fifth place with 3.5 million views and Season 3 took eighth place with 3 million views.
	

	â€œHis & Hersâ€ had its fifth week on the chart, this time in third place with 6.2 million views. It was followed by the Valentineâ€™s Day edition of â€œIs It Cake?â€ with 4.3 million views. In sixth place after â€œBridgertonâ€ Season 1 was the Feb. 2 edition of â€œRaw: 2026,â€ followed by â€œJeffrey Epstein: Filthy Richâ€ with 3.1 million views.


	At No. 9 after â€œBridgertonâ€ Season 3 was the â€œSullivanâ€™s Crossing,â€ which hit 2.8 million views in its third week on the chart, typing with the No. 10 title, â€œAnimal Kingdom.â€

	See the Netflix Top 10 for Feb. 2-8 below, beginning with English-language shows and movies and followed by non-English-language shows and movies.



	

	





	

	





	

	





	

	




	
		More from Variety

	Once a mo

	Once a month, the Criterion Collection announces new titles set for release in the future. New information drops around the 15th of the month for releases that would come out about three months later. These announcements are highly anticipated among movie fans and cinephiles, while thereâ€™s always speculation and rumors about which new films are joining the prestigious collection.

	For the month of February 2026, the Criterion Collection has five new releases, which range from 4K Ultra HD upgrades, like â€œ3:10 to Yuma,â€ â€œPlayTimeâ€ and John Cassavetesâ€™ â€œA Woman Under the Influence,â€ to new titles, like Joel and Ethan Coenâ€™s â€œThe Man Who Wasnâ€™t Thereâ€ and Sidney Lumetâ€™s â€œNetwork.â€ Titles are also either DVD, Blu-ray or 4K Ultra HD editions.


	Additionally, all of these new releases are on sale for 30% off at Barnes & Noble with prices starting at $27.99 (reg. $39.99). In fact, even the preorder titles are discounted â€” ahead of their release later this month.

Membership gets you a number of perks, like free shipping on all orders, early access to special editions and events, an additional 10 percent off at checkout and more.

	Meanwhile, if you live near a Barnes & Noble location, you can order online and opt to pick up your goods in-store for free. Learn more about B&N membership and rewards here.

title: â€˜The Mummy 4â€™ With Brendan Fraser and Rachel Weisz Gets May 2028 Release Date
description: Academy Award winners Brendan Fraser and Rachel Weisz are officially returning for a fourth installment of the blockbuster franchise, â€œThe Mummy.â€
body:
Academy Award winners Brendan Fraser and Rachel Weisz are officially returning for a fourth installment of the blockbuster franchise, â€œThe Mummy.â€

	Universal Pictures has dated the movie for a wide theatrical release on May 19, 2028.

	Fraser and Weisz, whose involvement was first reported last fall, have closed deals to reprise their roles as adventurer Rick Oâ€™Connell and Egyptologist Evelyn Oâ€™Connell in the movie, plot details for which are being kept â€” not unironically â€” under wraps.
	

	The actorsâ€™ legend begins with the 1999 reboot of â€œThe Mummy,â€ which follows a treasure hunter who accidentally awakens a cursed Egyptian priest with supernatural powers. The movie and its 2001 sequel â€œThe Mummy Returnsâ€ were major box office hits, reviving the classic monster movie IP and establishing Fraser as a bankable action star. Weisz, however, did not appear in the 2008 threequel â€œThe Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor,â€ so her return to the franchise is particularly thrilling for fans. 


	The new â€œMummyâ€ movie is directed by Radio Silenceâ€™s Matt Bettinelli-Olpin and Tyler Gillett (â€œReady or Notâ€ and sequel â€œReady or Not 2: Here I Comeâ€) from a screenplay by David Coggeshall (â€œThe Family Plan,â€ â€œOrphan: First Killâ€). 

	Sean Daniel â€” who has produced each installment of the $1.8 billion-grossing franchise at the studio since 1999â€™s â€œThe Mummy,â€ including â€œThe Mummy Returns,â€ â€œThe Scorpion King,â€ â€œThe Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperorâ€ and the 2017 Dark Universe project â€œThe Mummyâ€ â€” also returns for the film. 

	William Sherak, James Vanderbilt and Paul Neinstein also produce through Project X Entertainment. In addition to starring in the movie, Fraser will serve as an executive producer alongside Hivemindâ€™s Jason F. Brown and Denis Stewart.
	

	Executive VP of production development Jay Polidoro and director of production development Jacqueline Garell will oversee the project for the studio. 

	Fraser and Weisz are represented by CAA and Linden Entertainment. Fraser is also repped by Felker Tozcek Suddleson Abramson, and Weisz by Independent Talent and Hirsch Wallerstein Hayum Matlof + Fishman.

	CAA also represents Radio Silence alongside Brillstein Entertainment Partners and Johnson Shapiro Slewett & Kole. Coggeshall is represented by WME, Writ Large and McKuin Frankel Whitehead.

schema.headline: â€˜The Mummy 4â€™ With Brendan Fraser and Rachel Weisz Gets May 2028 Release Date

title: Kid Rock Denies Lip-Syncing at Turning Point USA Halftime Show and Says â€˜Crazy Libtardsâ€™ and the â€˜Fake News Mediaâ€™ Are Spreading Fake Reports
description: Kid Rock posted a video on X in which he tried to explain what happened during his performance of â€œBawitdabaâ€ during Turning Point USAâ€™s All-America
body:
Kid Rock posted a video on X in which he tried to explain what happened during his performance of â€œBawitdabaâ€ during Turning Point USAâ€™s All-American Halftime Show, which aired on Super Bowl Sunday as an act of protest against the NFLâ€™s decision to have Bad Bunny perform during the big game. Kid Rock was widely accused of lip synching â€œBawitdaba,â€ as at various times during the performance he was blatantly out of sync with the actual music. Kid Rock denies such accusations on X, writing: â€œNo lip-syncing like the haters and fake news are trying to report.â€
	

	â€œThat song is chaos,â€ Kid Rock explained in a video post. â€œThe first thing is, if I was ever going to lip sync â€” which I wouldnâ€™t â€” that would be the last song I would ever do it to. We performed this song every night on tour since 1998 since the day it was released. Turning Point USA sent me a first cut [after] we taped it and my comment was, â€˜the sync is off.â€™ They were trying to line it up â€¦ It was very difficult for them, because somebody clearly wasnâ€™t super familiar with the song. It could have been done had we had more time.â€


	â€œSo I have nothing but good things to say â€” not only about Turning Point, but the production team that they work with,â€ Kid Rock continued. â€œNobodyâ€™s perfect every time. But for the haters and the trolls out there, thatâ€™s exactly what happened. And by the way, most of you know this. Some of you in the entertainment world can look at that and be like, â€˜the sync is off.â€™ But they had to lie and say, â€˜Oh, he was lip syncing.â€™ Then people amplify this all over the internet. And I know most people donâ€™t even care, but the certain people just keep repeating it, so people think itâ€™s a fact. And this goes on on both sides. They did it to Bad Bunny, in his defense, when â€¦ he was on â€˜Saturday Night Liveâ€™â€¦ they [claim lip syncing] far too often, especially in the fake news media, the left-wingers, the crazy libtards.â€
	

	Kid Rock was widely mocked on social media for allegedly lip-synching during Turning Point USAâ€™s Halftime Show while Bad Bunny delivered a spectacular live performance at the Super Bowl. Jimmy Kimmel quipped that Kid Rock was in a â€œlip sync battle with himself,â€ adding that MAGA often â€œcomplains about how bad everything is, and then they do it worse.â€ 

	In an interview on Fox Newsâ€™ â€œThe Ingraham Angleâ€ the night after both halftime shows, Kid Rock shaded Bad Bunny by saying of his performance: â€œLike most people, I didnâ€™t understand any of it. I saw thereâ€™s a lot of dancers and a lot of big to-do stuff. And, you know, he said he wanted to have a dance party; it looked like he had one.â€

	Kid Rock continued, â€œNot my cup of tea, but I donâ€™t fault that kid for doing the Super Bowl, getting in front of a global audience. I fault the NFL for putting him in that position and Turning Point for having to come out and have an alternative for people to watch. You know, itâ€™s just â€” poor kid.â€

My halftime performance was pre recorded but performed live. No lipsycing like the haters and fake news are trying to report. When they synced the cameras to my performance on Bawitdaba, it did not line up as I explain in this video. pic.twitter.com/k1x1RfI9RYâ€” KidRock (@KidRock) February 10, 2026

schema.headline: Kid Rock Denies Lip-Syncing at Turning Point USA Halftime Show and Says â€˜Crazy Libtardsâ€™ and the â€˜Fake News Mediaâ€™ Are Spreading Fake Reports

title: Pedro Almodovar Leads Petition Over New Threat to Argentinaâ€™s Film-TV Body, INCAA
description: Alarm bells are sounding again over the fate of Argentinaâ€™s beleaguered film-TV body, INCAA. A draft proposal from Argentinaâ€™s administration includ
body:
Alarm bells are sounding again over the fate of Argentinaâ€™s beleaguered film-TV body, INCAA. A draft proposal from Argentinaâ€™s administration includes a repeal of key articles that will impact the institute. These articles currently guarantee dedicated funding for INCAA, mostly drawn from box office receipts.

	While the bill does not formally dissolve INCAA, industry reps warn that eliminating its specific funding sources would effectively weaken the institution by forcing it to depend on general allocations from the National Treasury. This could threaten Argentinaâ€™s already declining audiovisual sector.
	

	FIPCA, the Ibero-American Federation of Cinematographic and Audiovisual Production, has lodged a petition urging members of Argentinaâ€™s congress to prevent what it describes as an â€œaudiovisual blackoutâ€ in the country. Its senate is slated to debate the new bill on Feb. 11.


	The petition has been signed by a wide swathe of industry leaders across Ibero-America. Among the more than 800 signatories are Pedro Almodovar, Spanish producer Juan Gordon of Morena Films, Argentine star Adrian Suar, Chileâ€™s AndrÃ©s Wood (â€œThe House of the Spirits,â€ premiering at the Berlin Film Festival) and Argentine director Marcos Carnevale (â€œHeart of Lionâ€).

	â€œThe future of Argentinaâ€™s audiovisual production is going through a critical moment. The potential loss of its historic sources of financing places the industry at a crossroads that demands rigor: audiovisual production is not a decorative activity, but an industry that competes in global markets and in every country with significant output, operates under specific public policies,â€ FIPCA president Ignacio Rey told Variety.
	

	â€œWithin that same bill there is an article that repeals three articles of the Film Law â€“ specifically the ones that provide INCAA with its earmarked funds. That is, it eliminates the 10% tax on movie tickets that has existed for 60 years, as well as two other revenue sources that were established in the 1994 reform of the law. This leaves INCAA at the mercy of the Ministry of Economy to grant whatever amounts it chooses, whenever it chooses,â€ explained Gabriela Sandoval, FIPCA vice president.



	

					Chileâ€™s Gabriela Sandoval, Fipca VP, Co-Founder Storyboard Media. Courtesy of Fipca
	



	Â â€œThis change could significantly limit the instituteâ€™s operational capacity and jeopardize the continuity of an industry that generates employment, exports services and contributes high value-added economic activity across the country,â€ FIPCA stated in its petition.

	Rey cited the case of Brazil: â€œBefore 2019, with [Brazilâ€™s film-TV body] ANCINE active, the sector was growing and internationalizing. Between 2019 and 2022, when the agency was defunded, production contracted and dozens of companies closed. Since 2023, with the reactivation of incentives, the industry has recovered. The result is measurable: in 2025 Brazil won the Oscar for International Feature Film with â€˜Iâ€™m Still Here,â€™ and this year received five nominations, including best International Feature Film and Picture for â€˜The Secret Agent.â€™â€

	â€œThe public financing of the audiovisual sector is not an Argentine exception; it is the global standard for film industries worldwide. The countries that lead global production combine support funds and tax incentives to attract investment, develop talent and compete in the global content economy,â€ said FIPCA VP Diego F. RamÃ­rez of 64-A Films (â€œDog Eat Dogâ€).



	

					Diego RamÃ­rez of Colombiaâ€™s 64-A Films, Fipca Vice President. Courtesy of Fipca
	



	Since rising to power in December 2023, Argentinaâ€™s current administration has moved forward with a sweeping economic adjustment agenda, delivering on campaign promises of deep cuts to public spending. Its omnibus bill proposed in January 2024, which would have scrapped INCAA, failed to pass, after massive protests and a petition signed by the worldâ€™s most celebrated filmmakers made an impact. This new petition hopes to achieve the same result.

schema.headline: Pedro Almodovar Leads Petition Over New Threat to Argentinaâ€™s Film-TV Body, INCAA

title: â€˜Sistasâ€™ Star Novi Brown Signs With Innovative Artists Entertainment (EXCLUSIVE)
description: Novi Brown has signed with Innovative Artists Entertainment for representation in all areas, Variety has learned exclusively. She continues to be re
body:
Novi Brown has signed with Innovative Artists Entertainment for representation in all areas, Variety has learned exclusively. She continues to be repped by Alta Global Media and Crawford Talents, Germany. 

	Brown is best known for her starring role in the hit BET series â€œSistas,â€ which hails from celebrated and prolific creator Tyler Perry. Brown starred as Sabrina Hollins in the first nine seasons of the show, exiting ahead of the 10th, which is began airing in January 2026. The show has proven to be strong part of BETâ€™s scripted lineup, inspiring two spinoffs already â€” â€œZatimaâ€ and â€œDivorced Sistas.â€ 
	

	Brown also starred in and was a consulting producer on the holiday film â€œA Wesley South African Christmasâ€ directed by Patricia Cuffie-Jones, working opposite Jasmine Guy, Dorian Wilson, T.C. Carson and Terrayle Hill. She has appeared in numerous other leading roles, including films like â€œAlone in the Dark,â€ â€œThe First Noelle,â€ and â€œHoliday Hideaway.â€ Aside from â€œSistas,â€ she previously appeared on the hit CBS procedural â€œNCIS.â€ 


	In theater, Brown appeared in stage productions of â€œThe Vagina Monologues,â€ â€œDutchman,â€ and â€œBoston Marriage.â€ She was also an investor in the recent Broadway production of â€œOthelloâ€ starring Denzel Washington and Jake Gyllenhaal. The production sold out all performances and quickly became one of the most talked about shows in all of Broadway. 

	As a producer, Brown executive produced the short film â€œDrugs Are Fun,â€ which recently secured a spot at the Pan African Film Festival. There are plans to develop the film into a series.

schema.headline: â€˜Sistasâ€™ Star Novi Brown Signs With Innovative Artists Entertainment (EXCLUSIVE)

title: Nancy Guthrieâ€™s Kidnapping: First Photos of Person of Interest Released by FBI
description: Police have been investigating the kidnapping of â€œTodayâ€ co-anchor Savannah Guthrieâ€˜s mother since Feb. 1, and one of the biggest clues so far has f
body:
Police have been investigating the kidnapping of â€œTodayâ€ co-anchor Savannah Guthrieâ€˜s mother since Feb. 1, and one of the biggest clues so far has finally been released.

	Photos of a person of interest in the search for Nancy Guthrie were released by FBI director Kash Patel on X on Feb. 10.

New images in the search for Nancy Guthrie:Â Over the last eight days, the FBI and Pima County Sheriffâ€™s Department have been working closely with our private sector partners to continue toÂ recover any images or video footage from Nancy Guthrieâ€™s home that may have been lost,â€¦ pic.twitter.com/z5WLgPtZpTâ€” FBI Director Kash Patel (@FBIDirectorKash) February 10, 2026


	Along with the photos, Patel released the following message:


	New images in the search for Nancy Guthrie:
	

	Over the last eight days, the FBI and Pima County Sheriffâ€™s Department have been working closely with our private sector partners to continue to recover any images or video footage from Nancy Guthrieâ€™s home that may have been lost, corrupted, or inaccessible due to a variety of factors â€“ including the removal of recording devices. The video was recovered from residual data located in backend systems.

	Working with our partners â€“ as of this morning, law enforcement has uncovered these previously inaccessible new images showing an armed individual appearing to have tampered with the camera at Nancy Guthrieâ€™s front door the morning of her disappearance.

	Anyone with information, please contact 1-800-CALL-FBI or visit http://tips.fbi.gov.

	See all of the photos below.



	

									Courtesy of FBI
	





	

									Courtesy of FBI
	





	

									Courtesy of FBI
	





	

									Courtesy of FBI
	



	Nancy Guthrie was first reported missing on Feb. 1, when she missed a virtual church service, NBC News reports. The story has taken on national interest due to Savannah Guthrieâ€™s status as a well-known media figure and her co-workers at â€œTodayâ€ reporting updates during her leave.

	On Monday, Savannah Guthrie released a new video on social media, saying, â€œWe believe our mom is still out there. We need your help. Law enforcement is working tirelessly around the clock trying to bring her home â€” trying to find her. She was taken and we donâ€™t know where. And we need your help.
	

	â€œSo Iâ€™m coming on just to ask you not just for your prayers, but no matter where you are â€” even if youâ€™re far from Tuscon,â€ she continued. â€œIf you see anything, if you hear anything, if thereâ€™s anything at all that seems strange to you â€” that you report to law enforcement. We are at an hour of desperation, and we need your help.â€

schema.headline: Nancy Guthrieâ€™s Kidnapping: First Photos of Person of Interest Released by FBI

title: Andy Dick Looks Healthy Riding Bike in L.A. After Near-Fatal Overdose
description:
Andy Dick Video
                          Wheels Back Into Action After Drug Overdose
body:
Andy Dick Video
                          Wheels Back Into Action After Drug Overdose
                      
                  
                                                                        Published 
                              February 10, 2026
                            12:26 PM PST
                                                                            
      
    
      
        
                    
                  
      
                    Framework Media
          
    
          Looks like Andy Dick may finally be pumping the brakes after his terrifying overdose ... 'cause he was spotted looking healthy and happy during a bike ride around L.A.
      
    
          TMZ obtained this clip of Andy not long after wrapping up a 50-day rehab stint -- he was cruising through the L.A. streets Tuesday morning, putting his health first with a spot of cardio.
      
    
      
        
                    
                  
      
                    YouTube/Billy John
          
    
          Andy appeared upbeat and relaxed, chatting it up with a buddy as they rode through a quiet residential neighborhood ... a pretty stark contrast from where we last saw him.
      

          Youâ€™ll remember, back in December, Andy was slumped over on a Hollywood sidewalk while a friend sprinted to CVS to grab Narcan -- the opioid overdose-reversal drug -- and administered it on the spot to save his life.
      
    
                  
          
                          
                
                                  
      
    
          Andy later opened up on the "Hate To Break It To Ya" podcast, admitting that when he came to, his first instinct was vodka. Sources told us at the time that drinking from morning to night had basically become his routine.
      
    
          But judging by this latest sighting, Andy looks like heâ€™s finally steering himself in a better direction!

title: Adult Content Creator Bonnie Blue Has Unprotected Sex With 'About 400 Men'
description:
Bonnie Blue
                          I Slept With 400 Men on My 'Breeding Mission'
body:
Bonnie Blue
                          I Slept With 400 Men on My 'Breeding Mission'
                      
                  
                                                                        Published 
                              February 10, 2026
                            7:14 AM PST
                                                                      |
                                                                Updated 
                                  February 10, 2026
                                9:21 AM PST
                                    
      
    
                  
          
                          
                
                  
      
    
          More like Bonnie Blue ... her back out! The adult content creator reportedly had unprotected sex with around 400 men, setting a world record.
      
    
          That's right ... While the Winter Olympics wage on in Italy, the bedroom Olympics raged in the UK over the weekend. Us Weekly reports Bonnie -- real name Tia Billinger -- had men waiting in line for up to 7 hours at Lord Davenport's mansion on February 7 for the chance to "breed" her.
      
    
          According to Us Weekly, the previous record was 65 men. That achievement was reached by Ariana Jollee in 2004.
      

          Bonnie, 26, told the publication, â€œI was concerned Iâ€™d drown with the amount of fluids I had planned to consume, and did consume by the end of the day. I wanted the men who wanted to be a dad the most, with the strongest swimmers, to get a fast pass to the front of the queue.â€
      
    
                  
          
                          
                
                  
      
    
          We don't know if those "swimmers" swam breaststroke, backstroke or freestyle ... but it looks like they all, uh, swam the race to completion.
      
    
          But it's unlikely any of this would result in a new life being brought into the world. Bonnie has previously gone public about her fertility struggles.
      
    
                  
          
                          
                
                                  
      
    
          â€œI tried to get pregnant for years with my ex-partner and really, really struggled and Iâ€™d have to go down the IVF route,â€ she told Us Weekly in June 2025. â€œSo I wish I could say I might get pregnant, however, Iâ€™m not in that position where I can fall pregnant naturally.â€
      
    
          This marks Bonnie's second record-setting feat. She claimed to have slept with 1,057 men in 12 hours back in January 2025. Sadly, OnlyFans star Lily Phillips beat the brakes off that record when she allegedly slept with 1,113 men within the same time constraint.

title: Products to Reduce Stress, Boost Energy
description:
Raw-Dogging Reality Ain't Working
                          So Tired It's Starting to Feel Personal?
body:
Raw-Dogging Reality Ain't Working
                          So Tired It's Starting to Feel Personal?
                          Here's Some Simple Fixes ğŸ˜‰
                      
                  
                                                                        Published 
                              February 10, 2026
                            12:05 AM PST
                                                                            
              
    
                  
          
                          
                
                                  
      
    
          TMZ may collect a share of sales or other compensation from links on this page.
      
    
          Life's a frickin' grind.
      
    
          No wonder you're tired all the time ... We get it, we really do.
      
    
          And to show we care, here's a list of things that could help you max out on your rest periods. You can thank us later.
      
    
          TMZ CHEATSHEET: THINGS FOR WHEN YOU REALIZE YOU'RE ALWAYS FREAKIN' TIRED
  

          Actually-Comfortable Sleep Masks (Not the Cheap Hotel Ones): $15Weighted Blanket: $52Vitamin B-12 Supplements: $9Blue Blockers: $16Massager: $38
      
    
              
      Actually-Comfortable Sleep Masks (Not the Cheap Hotel Ones)
      
        
    
                    
                          
                                  
      
        
    
          The best way to rejuvenate is the old-fashioned way ... get some deep sleep!
      
    
          And here's where these sleep masks come in -- these things are so genuinely comfy, you won't even notice them when you're laying your head on the pillow, shutting things down in your head, and getting some decent rest.
      
    
              
      Weighted Blanket
      
        
    
                    
                          
                                  
      
        
    
          Sometimes it's hard to just settle down and not feel restless ... even when chilling on the couch or laying in bed.
      
    
          Let us introduce you to the weighted blanket ... it's like a whole body hug and a great way to really decompress.
      
    
          This one here weighs 15lbs and by the time you get it on top of you -- well, you've had your workout for the day and truly earned that RnR.
      
    
              
      Vitamin B-12 Supplements
      
        
    
                    
                          
                                  
      
        
    
          There are people who swear by B-12 supplements ... and claim it gives you all the energy you need without the caffeine jitters.
      
    
          The ones listed above, from Nature's Bounty, have great customer reviews on Amazon.
      
    
          In fact, one five star review gushed: "I definitely have been feeling better after taking this for a few weeks. One dropper full each day under the tongue and it tastes nice, not bad in the slightest bit! If you want to try some B12, this is your brand."
      
    
              
      Blue Blockers
      
        
    
                    
                          
                                  
      
        
    
          Screen fatigue ain't no joke ... and it can wear on not just your eyes but also your soul.
      
    
          Enter these blue blockers -- these bad boys block out all that gnarly blue light from your screens and will keep you going all through the workday hopefully feeling that much sharper.
      
    
              
      Massager
      
        
    
                    
                          
                                  
      
        
    
          Okay, time to break out the big guns ... this massager's always gonna be there for those days where that stress really burrows its way down into your muscles and needs to be gently -- or roughly, whatever your style is -- coaxed out of your body.
      
    
          Pop this sucker on, hit start, and let all that tension out of your body get pounded into nothingness ... leaving nothing but pure chill left.
      
    
          All prices and availability subject to change.

                    BACKGRID
          
    
          Rihanna might have a billionaire price tag attached to her name ... but sheâ€™s still clocking in for regular-degular grocery runs just like the rest of us!
      
    
          Check the video ... RiRi rolled into an L.A. supermarket Monday dressed head-to-toe in black, yet somehow still impossible to miss. Case in point ... an elderly shopper behind her was so mesmerized she accidentally grabbed Rihannaâ€™s cart, thinking it was her own!!
      
    
                  
          
                          
                
                  
      
    
          Rihanna shared a giggle with the woman over the incident ... proving she had no chip on her shoulder, especially since her priority at that moment was shopping for potatoes.
      

          That said, this wasnâ€™t exactly a solo grocery store run. Rihanna was closely tailed by her bodyguard and even had her personal chef in tow -- presumably on standby for dinner inspo while she also grabbed scallions, grapes, bananas and more.
      
    
          So yeah, sheâ€™s out there like any busy mom ... just with a security detail, a personal chef, and someone else hauling the groceries while she casually struts a single flower pot to the parking lot!

title: Demi Lovato Postpones Tour, Cancels Dates to Protect Her Health
description:
Demi Lovato
                          I'm Overextended, So I'm Axing Tour Dates!!!
body:
Demi Lovato
                          I'm Overextended, So I'm Axing Tour Dates!!!
                      
                  
                                                                        Published 
                              February 10, 2026
                            8:33 AM PST
                                                                            
      
    
                  
          
                          
                
                  
      
    
          Bad news for some Lovatics ... Demi Lovato just pulled the plug on a whopping five dates from her "Itâ€™s Not That Deep" tour.
      
    
          In a lengthy IG Stories post Tuesday, Demi revealed sheâ€™s also pushing back the tour kickoff -- moving it from April 8 in Charlotte, NC to April 13 in Orlando, FL -- saying the call is all about protecting her health.
      
    
                  
          
                          
                
                                  
      
    
          Demi explained once rehearsals got underway, it became clear sheâ€™d overextended herself. Bottom line: she needs more time to "rest and rehearse" so she can actually make it through the entire run.
      

          The cities on Demi's chopping board include Charlotte, Nashville, Atlanta, Las Vegas, and Denver. The Disney alum apologized to her fans and laid out exactly how and where they can get refunds.
      
    
          Those fans will be understandably bummed ... especially since Demi hasnâ€™t toured since 2022 and this new tour was meant to follow the release of her ninth album last October. Now, they'll just have to regroup, grab refunds, and start booking flights to the cities that survived the cut!
